name: R32FirstColumnInSetAndSecondColumnNotMatch
displayName: R32 First Column In Set And Second Column Not Match
description: Check first column in set and the second column not match regex.

parameterDefinition.name: firstColumn
parameterDefinition.description: the column to test in set.

parameterDefinition.name: testFirstColumnValues
parameterDefinition.description: the set of Values to test with first column. Separated by |. For example: CCCD|CMTND..

parameterDefinition.name: secondColumn
parameterDefinition.description: The Column to test match regex.

parameterDefinition.name: testSecondColumnRegex
parameterDefinition.description: The REGEX to test with Second column.
